official-title.#text:
To amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit
		  Control Act of 1985 to exempt the Department of Defense from reduction under
		  any order issued to carry out a sequestration pursuant to section
		  251A.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Department of Defense
			 exemption from section 251A sequestration
